title: Convincing
alt: And if you labeled your axes, I could tell you exactly how MUCH better.
transcript:
[Cueball and Megan are talking. Megan has a board.]
Cueball: I think we should give it another shot.
Megan: We should break up, and I can prove it.[The second panel is the graph. A series of points moves steadily downward.]
Our Relationship.[Cueball looks at the graph.]
Cueball: Huh.Cueball: Maybe you're right.
Megan: I knew data would convince you.
Cueball: No, I just think I can do better than someone who doesn't label her axes.
